text: which the LORD ordered to be given them from the Israelites on the day they were anointed, as their due throughout their generations forever.
On the fifth day it was the turn of the tribal leader of the Simeonites, Shelumiel, son of Zurishaddai.
On the flat ends of the handles and on the panels, wherever there was a bare space, cherubim, lions, and palm trees were carved, as well as wreaths all around.
The sons of Zophah were Suah, Harnepher, Shual, Beri, Imrah,
descendants of Jericho, three hundred and forty-five;
The priests, however, went in and stood before the altar and the sanctuary. They wept and said:
Our brothers, after enduring brief pain, have drunk of never-failing life, under God’s covenant. But you, by the judgment of God, shall receive just punishments for your arrogance.
In whatever you do, remember your last days, and you will never sin.
He ordered them not to tell anyone. But the more he ordered them not to, the more they proclaimed it.
A Pharisee invited him to dine with him, and he entered the Pharisee’s house and reclined at table.
What is the meaning of his saying, ‘You will look for me and not find [me], and where I am you cannot come’?” Rivers of Living Water.
This man led them out, performing wonders and signs in the land of Egypt, at the Red Sea, and in the desert for forty years.
If anyone thinks he is behaving improperly toward his virgin, and if a critical moment has come and so it has to be, let him do as he wishes. He is committing no sin; let them get married.
